content:
Cross posting this tweet here:

Help us measure Pangeo's impact on science! Please report any publications that use Pangeo-supported tools (xarray, dask, zarr, intake, etc) or computing environments (Cloud & HPC) on this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf7xT8W2hkF9Y20JtzoCW41lZov7fGTRgXpARk-Q0bdIMtXmQ/viewform

We promise it's easy, just a need a DOI...
